# Function configureMetric

  * configureMetric(config: [MetricConfigInterface](/interfaces/telemetry.MetricConfigInterface)): void

Configures a metric with the telemetry system

#### Parameters

    * config: [MetricConfigInterface](/interfaces/telemetry.MetricConfigInterface)

Configuration for the metric to register

#### Returns void

#### Description

Registers a metric definition for later use in recording data

#### Throws

When metric name is missing or configuration fails

#### Example


```
configureMetric(&#123;  metricType: MetricType.COUNTER_UINT,  name: 'requests_total',  description: 'Total number of HTTP requests',  unit: 'requests'&#125;);

```
